DOC.brief_summary: This RCT compare clinical radiographic success pulpotomies primary molar traditional technique ( Formocresol/ZOE ) new technique Biodentine . 180 pulpotomies ( 90 group ) follow period 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial Primary Molar Pulpotomy , Biodentine Vs Formocresol-ZOE
DOC.criteria: ASA I II le 1/3 physiologic root resorption asymptomatic tooth ( history symptom ) clinical radiological sign pathology vital tooth , carious pulpal exposure hemostasis must obtain simply pressure le 5 min teeth restore stainless steel crown 10 y.o . symptomatic tooth ( presently history symptom ) previous pulpal treatment tooth necrotic pulp hyperemic pulp inadequate operative technique , defective restauration non diagnostic xray ( pre post treatment )
